column5: VERY close to the Medical Center (1.0 mile), Rice Village/Rice University, (1.0 mile), NRG (1.5 miles), Houston Zoo (1.5 miles), the Museum District (2.0 miles), and more. We are also very close to the METRO Rail (1.0 mile). You will really enjoy your stay because of the location! Quiet neighborhood. We're laid-back and friendly hosts. Let us know if you need anything!
column8: Private Rm+Bath --walk to Med Cntr/Rice Univ/NRG
